LeaderIPRequestPacket Class Reference

Packet used for requesting the ip-number and the port number for a Leader-module, to be able to send TCP to the Leader module. More...

Detailed Description

Packet used for requesting the ip-number and the port number for a Leader-module, to be able to send TCP to the Leader module.
